DefaultEvent.Description: The Gnomic Gallivant embraces you like a comrade. "Absolutely delightful. You have helped my master pen a happier history for us all. I'll be sure to tell him of your assistance when we reach the Castle."

ChildBranches.Name: $Kingeater's Castle -> 王喰らいの城$Agree to deliver him to Kingeater's Castle
ChildBranches.Description: You have already come this far together. See it through to the end.

DefaultEvent.Description: The Gnomic Gallivant frowns. "How disappointing. And here I took you for a great soul. Well, well. We all make mistakes. As you were then, [q:Addressed As]. I'll chart another course for Kingeater's."

ChildBranches.Name: Refuse
ChildBranches.Description: You won't suffer his presence a moment longer.

Description: $Kingeater's Castle -> 王喰らいの城$The Gnomic Gallivant dusts off his suit. "So ends a thousand years. I've one last appointment, [q:Addressed As], in Kingeater's Castle. Time is a cage, and I'm anxious to get there as swiftly as you'll allow."
Name: The Gnomic Gallivant's Request
